name: Robert G. SCANLON, Secretary of Education, and Edward G. Biester, Jr., Acting Attorney General v. MOUNT UNION AREA BOARD OF SCHOOL DIRECTORS, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Scanlon v. Mount Union Area Board of School Directors

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Robert G. SCANLON, Secretary of Education, and Edward G. Biester, Jr., Acting Attorney General v. MOUNT UNION AREA BOARD OF SCHOOL DIRECTORS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed, 51 Pa.Cmwlth. 83, 415 A.2d 96.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John R. Miller, Bellefonte, for appellant.
Gwendolyn T. Mosley, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.

casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1016
Robert G. SCANLON, Secretary of Education, and Edward G. Biester, Jr., Acting Attorney General v. MOUNT UNION AREA BOARD OF SCHOOL DIRECTORS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 28, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
John R. Miller, Bellefonte, for appellant.
Gwendolyn T. Mosley, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Michael I. Levin, Harrisburg, for Pa. Sch. Bd. Assoc.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
